item.title: Learn Arabic from scratch (1)
item.description: [Lesson 6-11] Embark on an exciting adventure into the beauty of the Arabic language with comprehensive courses designed especially for absolute beginners. Thank Asmae for her elaborate YouTube channel - “Learn Arabic with Asmae” (https://www.youtube.com/@learnarabicwithasmae1).
